thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com
thread.title: Michael St Lawrence
thread.title_full: RushMyPassport.com reviewed by Michael St Lawrence

author: Michael St Lawrence
title: Michael St Lawrence
text:
I discovered my passport was expired when planning a rushed business trip and panicked to the max. Went online and found this service and sort of felt like it was a longshot. Called them Sunday night, got all my papers together on Monday, fedex'd them out and sure enough, my passport came back on Thursday so I could catch my Friday AM flight to Ireland. It worked for me. Although they say 24-hour service, with the delivery and all, for me it was mail out on Monday and get back on Thursday.
The service isn't cheap, but it did work and helped me avoid a real catastrophe. Nice people... Good communication and thorough. If you're in a rush and you can afford it, it certainly worked for me.
